## FieldMultilineInput class

Class for an editable text area field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldMultilineInput extends FieldTextInput 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [FieldTextInput](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isOverflowedY\_](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.isoverflowedy__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Whether Y overflow is currently occurring. |
|  [maxLines\_](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.maxlines__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | number | Defines the maximum number of lines of field. If exceeded, scrolling functionality is enabled. |
|  [textGroup\_](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.textgroup__property.md) |  | SVGGElement | The SVG group element that will contain a text element for each text row when initialized. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [configure\_(config)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.configure__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [doValueUpdate\_(newValue)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.dovalueupdate__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Called by setValue if the text input is valid. Updates the value of the field, and updates the text of the field if it is not currently being edited (i.e. handled by the htmlInput\_). Is being redefined here to update overflow state of the field. |
|  [getDisplayText\_()](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.getdisplaytext__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get the text from this field as displayed on screen. May differ from getText due to ellipsis, and other formatting. |
|  [getMaxLines()](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.getmaxlines_1_method.md) |  | Returns the maxLines config of this field. |
|  [onHtmlInputKeyDown\_(e)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.onhtmlinputkeydown__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Handle key down to the editor. Override the text input definition of this so as to not close the editor when enter is typed in. |
|  [render\_()](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.render__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the text of the textElement. |
|  [setMaxLines(maxLines)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.setmaxlines_1_method.md) |  | Sets the maxLines config for this field. |
|  [showEditor\_(\_opt\_e, opt\_quietInput)](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.showeditor__1_method.md) |  | Show the inline free-text editor on top of the text. Overrides the default behaviour to force rerender in order to correct block size, based on editor text. |
|  [updateSize\_()](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.updatesize__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the size of the field based on the text. |
|  [widgetCreate\_()](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.widgetcreate__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create the text input editor widget. |
